title: 关于多人联机164环境MOD问题
author: 苦力怕乄
txt_content: 如何关闭环境MOD的物理作用，方块掉下来这种（多人联机的）

replies.author: Dorget丶诺云
replies.txt_content:
在与启动器文件同一目录下找到Config文件夹，之后再依次双击enviromine，profiles，Default。之后再找到Default_Settings.cfg,右键用记事本打开。
找到
Hydration, and Body Temperature.
    B:"Allow Air Quality"=true
    B:"Allow Body Temperature"=true
    B:"Allow Hydration"=true
    B:"Allow Sanity"=true
    I:"Default spoil time (days)"=7
    # Turn physics On/Off
    B:"Enable Physics"=false
    B:"Enable Physics Landslide"=false
    B:"Enable food spoiling"=true
    B:"Enable villager assistance"=true
    B:"Torches burn"=true
    B:"Torches go out"=true
    # Track enviromine properties on Non-player entities(mobs & animals)
    B:"Track NonPlayer entities"=false
}
把上方打红字的false改为true就可以了。

replies.author: 苦力怕乄
replies.txt_content:
Dorget丶诺云 发表于 2015-8-7 15:43
